AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ancestral wanderer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a ancestral Oni wanderer of unknown origins, having one day suddenly finding [PAWN_objective]self here in this world.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lost wanderer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a lost ancestral Oni of unknown origins, suddenly finding [PAWN_objective]self here in this world.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: keen wanderer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a ancestral Oni traveller of unknown origins, and was unphased by the sudden introduction into this new world.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wild wanderer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a wild ancestral Oni wanderer of unknown origins, suddenly finding [PAWN_objective]self here in this world. [PAWN_objective] mindset is more close to that of a wild animal.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ancestral Oni explorer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a ancestral Oni explorer interested in the unknown. Seeking out new places brings out [PAWN_possessive] curiosity and is eager to try new things.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: homesick wanderer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a lost ancestral Oni explorer of unknown origins. [PAWN_pronoun] did not appreciate finding [PAWN_objective]self in this new world, and misses [PAWN_possessive] herd.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: manhunter ancestral Oni
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a ancestral Oni explorer of unknown origins. [PAWN_pronoun] found joy in hunting for smart prey, and have been on manhunter-like sprees. Due to this, [PAWN_pronoun] did learn how to treat injuries that comes with the hunt.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ancestral Oni nomad
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a ancestral Oni nomad who does not settle in one place for long, having a carefree life of living off the land.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ancestral Oni settler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a ancestral Oni who wants to find a good place to call home, and have wandered a long time to find a suitable location.
